Translations.Text: Tuus deus est 1 deus. Prout pro those non believe in Hereafter their hearts denying they est arrogant
Absolutely DEUS knows everything they conceal everything they declare He non love those est arrogant
When they asked Quod perfecit vos think de these revelations ex tuus Dominus they dictus Tales ex preter
They habuit responsible pro their sins Feria Resurrection totus de them alias to sins de totus those they misled their ignorance. Quod miserable load
